pageContext.claim: “With all of this being said, we have some excellent people, some very political people; some people that a thing like that wouldn't happen, or if it did happen, I guess they'll handle it somewhat differently. But we have many people that want that job.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump claims that "many people" are eager for the job of running the troubled Department of Veterans Affairs. In reality, the White House is having trouble filling it.
